alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 4:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 421 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canyon Lake, or 11 miles northeast of Apache Junction, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield and Tortilla Flat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River
